div.h3: POC - GWT with RPC and at backend Apache CFX WebService SOAP with Hibernate

ul.li: This project POC is performed by Raviraj Shettigar
Design UI using Google Web Toolkit and ajax call using RPC which inturn calls Apache CXF SOAP Service
Server side is developed using Basic Spring (with complete java configuration, no XML), Apache CXF SOAP Webservice and hibernate ORM
